org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtReactors

Class Inbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtReactors.Inbox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommonInbox, IsolationInbox

    public abstract class Inbox
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Provides at least two queues for a targetReactor's incoming messages, where the first queue is a concurrent linked queue for messages passed from other reactors and the other(s) are local queues for messages that are passed using the targetReactor's own thread.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<java.lang.Object> concurrentQueue
      Concurrent queue for cross-thread exchanges.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close all messages in the inbox.
      boolean hasConcurrent()
      Returns true when a message has been passed from another thread.
      abstract boolean hasWork()
      Returns true when there is a message in the inbox that can be processed.
      abstract boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true when all the queues are empty.
      abstract boolean isIdle()
      Returns true when the inbox is empty and no request messages are being processed in isolation.
      void offer(boolean _local, RequestMtImpl<?> _msg)
      Inserts a new message in the queue.
      void offer(java.util.Queue<RequestMtImpl<?>> _msgs)
      Thread-safe message insertion.
      protected abstract void offerLocal(RequestMtImpl<?> msg)
      Add a message to the appropriate doLocal queue.
      abstract RequestMtImpl<?> poll()
      Retrieves and removes from the inbox the next message to be processed, or returns null if there are no messages that can be processed.
      void requestBegin(RequestMtImpl<?> _requestImpl)
      Signals the start of a request.
      void requestEnd(RequestMtImpl<?> _message)
      Signals that the result of a request has been assigned.

      • hasConcurrent

        public boolean hasConcurrent()
        Returns true when a message has been passed from another thread.
        Returns:
        True when a message has been passed from another thread.

      • hasWork

        public abstract boolean hasWork()
        Returns true when there is a message in the inbox that can be processed. (This method is not thread safe and must be called on the targetReactor's thread.)
        Returns:
        True if there is a message in the inbox that can be processed.

      • isEmpty

        public abstract boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true when all the queues are empty.
        Returns:
        True when all the queues are empty.

      • isIdle

        public abstract boolean isIdle()
        Returns true when the inbox is empty and no request messages are being processed in isolation.
        Returns:
        True when there is no work pending.

      • offer

         RequestMtImpl<?> _msg)
        Inserts a new message in the queue.
        Parameters:
        _local - True when the message is being inserted using the targetReactor's own thread.
        _msg - The new message.

      • poll

        public abstract RequestMtImpl<?> poll()
        Retrieves and removes from the inbox the next message to be processed, or returns null if there are no messages that can be processed.
        Returns:
        The next message to be processed, or null if there are no messages to be processed.
